item.title: Trump: Tariffs Did Not Cause Inflation
item.description: On August 12th, Trump posted on Truth Social and claimed that tariffs did not lead to inflation and that consumers did not even bear those tariffs.

item.title: Aave's Total Value Locked Surpasses $25 Billion, Reaching an All-Time High
item.description: August 12th. Aave made an announcement that its Total Value Locked had exceeded $25 billion and reached a brand new all-time high.

item.title: U.S. publicly traded company Genius Group plans to pursue a dual listing in the Asian market
item.description: On August 12th, the U.S.-listed company Genius Group (GNS) declared that the Board of Directors had given the green light to a dual listing on exchanges in Asian markets with the aim of enhancing shareholder value and accessibility.On July 21st, the U.S.-listed company Genius Group announced that it had increased its holdings by 20 bitcoins, raising the total holdings to 200 bitcoins.

item.title: AguilaTrades closed a 15,000 ETH long position, realizing a profit of approximately $1.47 million.
item.description: On August 12th, as per the monitoring of EmberCN, the contract transaction whale AguilaTrades took a long position of 15,000 ETH at a price of $4,309. It was closed about 20 minutes ago at a price of $4,405, realizing a profit of approximately $1.47 million.

item.title: The three major Hyperliquid whales have once again increased their short positions, with a total unrealized loss of over $12 million, exacerbating the liquidation risk.
item.description: On August 12th, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight, in the past 2 hours, the three major short-selling whales have continuously increased their positions. As a result, their unrealized losses have been continuously expanding:The whale with an address starting with 0x5d2f44 added $810,000 to its BTC short position. Currently, the unrealized loss is $9.4 million, and the liquidation price is $127,831.The whale with an address starting with 0x49F306 added $850,000 to its ETH short position. Currently, the unrealized loss is $1.08 million, and the liquidation price is $4,615.The whale with an address starting with 0x880ac4 added 28.13 million PUMP tokens to its short position. Currently, the unrealized loss is $2.36 million, and the liquidation price is $0.005.The total unrealized loss of the short positions of the three major whales has exceeded $12.8 million. In the face of market fluctuations, one must be vigilant

item.title: Meme Token CWIF Experiences Short-Term Plunge of Nearly 90%, Market Cap Dips to $3.48 Million Before Recovery
item.description: On August 12th, based on GMGN data, the Solana-based Meme token CWIF, developed by the same team as TROLL, witnessed a short-term crash of approximately 90%. Its market value dropped sharply from $31 million to $3.48 million and is currently at $11 million, with a 24-hour trading volume of $24.4 million.Previously, CWIF was promoted by well-known crypto KOLs @AltcoinGordon and @jayxbt2012, highlighting it as the first sheep-themed token on pump.fun and emphasizing its connection to the TROLL developers and the unique narrative of the "sheep wearing a hat."BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins usually lack practical use cases, experience high price volatility, and advises caution when investing.

item.title: Sonic Testnet 2.1 Goes Live, Mainnet Launch Imminent
item.description: On August 12th, Sonic Labs made an announcement that Sonic Testnet 2.1 has been officially launched. It is compatible with the Ethereum Pectra upgrade and has expanded Sonic's capabilities. The mainnet is set to arrive shortly.

item.title: 「Fed's Signal Booster」: Rate Cut Threshold Shifts, but July CPI Still Insufficient to Prevent September Rate Cut
item.description: On August 12th, Nick Timiraos, a Wall Street Journal reporter renowned as the "Fed Whisperer", declared that the rate cut threshold had undergone a transformation following the release of today's CPI data. The rate cut plan for September might be impeded by today's CPI data, which was higher than expected. The CPI data from July did not suggest "no inflation", yet it might not be sufficient to prevent a rate cut in September.

item.title: Trump Urges Rate Cut Again, Threatens Major Lawsuit Against Powell
item.description: On August 12th, Trump once more posted on Truth Social and urged a rate cut, saying, "Jerome, it's too late. Powell must immediately lower interest rates. He is always 'too late', resulting in immeasurable losses. Fortunately, the economic situation is excellent. We have completely gotten rid of Powell and the complacent Federal Reserve. However, I am considering allowing a major lawsuit against Powell because he has done a terrible job in managing the construction of the Fed. He is extremely incompetent. This project should have only needed a $50 million repair, but it ended up costing $3 billion. It's truly awful!"

item.title: U.S. Stock Market's Three Major Indexes Open Higher, "Top Stablecoin Stock" Circle Soars 17%
item.description: On August 12th, based on the market data from RockFlow, the U.S. stock market opened with the three major indices showing an upward trend. The Dow increased by 0.4%, the S&P 500 rose by 0.4%, and the Nasdaq went up by 0.5%. "The First Stablecoin Stock" Circle witnessed a surge of 17%, with its second-quarter revenue witnessing a 53% year-on-year increase. Crypto-related stocks witnessed an overall rise, including:The new ETH Treasury company ETHZilla (ATNF) surged by more than 70%, with Peter Thiel and his investment team having previously acquired a 7.5% stake;Bitmine Immersion (BMNR) rose by 3.3%, announcing today its plans to raise $20 billion in financing to increase its ETH holdings;SharpLink Gaming (SBET) rose by 3.76%;Coinbase (COIN) rose by 1.4%;MicroStrategy (MSTR) fell by 0.3%.
